name: Haunted Antlers
description:
Haunted Antlers is a 2D Action Adventure game taking place in a mysterious forest. You play as the shaman of a small village inhabited by animals with curious antlers. His mission is to harvest the newborns, but on his latest mission, a strange creature take the baby in the depths of the forest...

This game is the result of a school project. It’s a four months production, working as a professional team. We hope you’ll enjoy what we managed to make !

Don't hesitate to share the game with all your friends !

/!\ It is REQUIRED to play with an Xbox 360 or Xbox One Controller /!\

Game made by :

Valentine Vuittenez as Project Manager - Lead Game Artist

Aurélien Mary as Lead Programmer - Game Designer / Personal website / Twitter

Simon Picardat as Lead Game Designer -programmer / Twitter

Manon Ghignoni as Game Designer - programmer

William Schmitt as Sound Designer - Game Designer

Matthieu Levy as Artitic Director - Game Artist  / Personal website

Nicolas Tognetti as Game Artist 

Helena Saglio as Game Artist / Instagram
